Entries.Title: Changes in version 2.2.3
Messages: Fix GPS Week Number Rollover on devices manufactured between 2006 and 2016.

Entries.Title: Changes in version 2.2.2
Messages: Fix crash due to inconsistency when exporting to GPX file.
Fix crash when collecting on some Xiaomi phones.

Entries.Title: Changes in version 2.2.0
Entries.Description:
!Important! Mozilla decided to limit API usage of their location service. The older versions of Tower Collector will not be able to contribute to MLS project from March 1, 2020.
The OpenCellID API keys are remain valid and don't need to be changed.
Messages: Adjusted MLS integration for upload usage limitations.
Added option to export to multiple file types at once.
Added option to compress each exported file.
Added confirmation for delete action after export.
Added Hebrew translation. Thanks Yaron Shahrabani!

Entries.Title: Changes in version 2.1.5
Messages: Improve look of shortcut icons on some launchers.
